channel.title: RadicalPkZ Paid host and Vps
channel.description:
[b]Hey Moparscapers![/b] [u][i][b] Note; This is the post I had from when I released. This is currently removed.[/b][/i][/u]
[b]This source contains;[/b] - Fixed ancient curses - Drains like real runescape. - Vote4Cash (How to fix this will be in the end) - Donor System (Shop with money) - Pvp arm - Pk points and pkpoint exchange. - FunPK in the arena nearby Magebank. - Runecrafting. [b]And alot more that I couldnt be bothered to add in![/b]
[b]Bugs/Glitches[/b] - The agility does not work, and I dont know how to fix that. Everything for agility is added, but it wont work. I added a command for agility instead. (::agility) Its a 1m fee per 100k agility xp. - If you hit the player after you killed him in duel arena, you have to tele home, and stats will not be restored. - The leech bug that idk to fix either, but you might figure out! - The overload is a 1zip potion, can be fixed in [code]potions.java[/code] [b]There is more though. You just have to find them. [/b]
[b]Fixes[/b] - Duel arena fully works, a few glitches which is easily fixed. - Donator store [b]Is a few more things, I just can't list them because it's so long since we did them.[/b]
[b]Some pictures.[/b] The Fully working overload! [img]http://img821.imageshack.us/img821/8105/ovlv.png[/img] Donor/Membershop [img]http://img37.imageshack.us/img37/8610/mmsj.png[/img] Home at duel arena, with shops and banks. [img]http://img101.imageshack.us/img101/9439/hws.png[/img] Donorzone [img]http://img850.imageshack.us/img850/7509/34761954.png[/img]
Server coder (1/2) 1 Slot Open Website Developer (0/2) 2 Slots Open Client sided developer (0/2) 2 Slots Open

item.title: RadicalPkZ Paid host and Vps
item.dc:creator: @Tobbescape Tobbescape
item.description:
@Tobbescape wrote:

..::Coded::..:

Looks too much like I-hybrid, same donor zone and donor tab

Yes, it is ihybrid. I didnt change the donorzone. I will change to a diff location later on.[quote=“Ix Soulcist xI, post:3, topic:400296”]It wouldn’t hurt to use diffrent pictures mate, but this looks boring to me and like the rest of them.[/quote]Sure, ill do that.

Read full topic

item.title: RadicalPkZ Paid host and Vps
item.dc:creator: @Tobbescape Tobbescape
item.description:
@Tobbescape wrote:

Hey Moparscapers!

Note; This is the post I had from when I released. This is currently removed.

This source contains;

  • Fixed ancient curses - Drains like real runescape.
  • Vote4Cash (How to fix this will be in the end)
  • Donor System (Shop with money)
  • Pvp arm
  • Pk points and pkpoint exchange.
  • FunPK in the arena nearby Magebank.
  • Runecrafting.
    And alot more that I couldnt be bothered to add in!

Bugs/Glitches

  • The agility does not work, and I dont know how to fix that. Everything for agility is added, but it wont work. I added a command for agility instead. (::agility) Its a 1m fee per 100k agility xp.
  • If you hit the player after you killed him in duel arena, you have to tele home, and stats will not be restored.
  • The leech bug that idk to fix either, but you might figure out!
  • The overload is a 1zip potion, can be fixed in potions.java
    There is more though. You just have to find them.

Fixes

  • Duel arena fully works, a few glitches which is easily fixed.
  • Donator store
    Is a few more things, I just can’t list them because it’s so long since we did them.

Some pictures.
The Fully working overload!

Donor/Membershop

Home at duel arena, with shops and banks.

Donorzone

Server coder (1/2) 1 Slot Open
Website Developer (0/2) 2 Slots Open
Client sided developer (0/2) 2 Slots Open

Read full topic
